website_summaries.verdict: Offers a ton of styling options from its six styling attachments, including a pre-styling dryer so you don’t have to switch tools to prep your hair for styling.
pros: Comes with  a 1.2” Airwrap barrel and a 1.6” Airwrap barrel for waves and curls, one firm and one soft smoothing brush for straighter styles, a round volumizing brush for creating body and a pre-styling dryer to quickly take wet hair to damp before styling
cons: Some users say it takes practice to style their hair with the Airwrap barrels

customer_reviews.title: Hair in the brushes when I received it
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Dyson Airwrap and for $550 I didn’t expect to see hair in the brushes! Disgusting! Obviously I received a used one. Trying to determine if I should return it. Very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Used product instead of new
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it as a present for my wife and received a used item with BLACK CURLY HAIR wrapped around the brushes, box dented, everything inside the box is a mess. We are sending it back. It is unacceptable for a $600 beauty item.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry Tyutikov

customer_reviews.title: FELL APART THE FIRST TIME
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! The brush attachment fell off AS I WAS STYLING MY HAIR for the first time, and the filter remained inside the wand. See attached photos. This is a $600 product, this should NOT have happened. Wanted to love this product very badly. DISAPPOINTED IN DYSON.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much!
customer_reviews.text: I already have a Dyson dryer so I kind of felt crazy buying this but I love this so much. I can get my hair so much straighter and smoother than with a round brush and my hair is naturally very frizzy, curly and thick. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a second use
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely excited to get the Dyson complete airwrap. Impressed by the speed of drying and nice bouncy curls. Recommended to all my friends after the first use ! Unfortunately it stopped working after a second use. Literally wouldn’t turn on. Extremely upset and disappointed. Had to request a return and warn all my friends not to buy it...
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: STOPS WORKING DURING USE & BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: My Dyson cuts out when in use & now it’s not turning back on!! So unacceptable for this price point. Very disappointed. I’ve been waiting 2 weeks for a replacement, still have not received it & they are saying it will be another 3-5 business days.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT WORK OUTSIDE USA EVEN WITH A HIGH POWER CONVERTER
customer_reviews.text: Dyson really failed on this one. It will NOT work anywhere but USA even with a heavy duty 3000W converter. Dyson customer service SUCKS and will not help out in any way. So I am in Europe and cannot use this junk. Total fail. How do you make a curling iron which people obviously use for travel, and make it so they can only use it in one country??
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: NOT OKAY!
customer_reviews.text: Just like other recent reviews there were hair in the brushes when I received it. It’s used!! I received my Dyson Airwrap today and for $550 the product was not NEW...lots of hair in the brushes... Gross! Very frustrating 🤬
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Poulsen

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Aaaamazing hair tool! Love this thing. My husband bought it for me for Christmas but gave it to me early and I’ve only used it a handful of times, so still figuring out tips and tricks but already love it! I would never curl my hair cuz it would take forever and then just fall flat too quickly anyway but with this thing, it holds without even using products in my hair. It’s kinda spendy, but after using it it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bess

customer_reviews.title: I hated this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for my hair. I have fine straight hair. It did not hold a curl with this machine also the round brush was really hard to get to brush through. I usually don’t have a problem using a round brush while blowdrying. I also found it frustrating to have to remove one wand for another it just took too long it took me a lot longer than normal and it costs $500!! No thank you. maybe if It was as great as everyone says it would be worth it but this just did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I got it for my sister for Christmas and she loves it. Her hair naturally is very straight so curls don’t last very long in her hair. With the curling attachments her hair remained curly until she washed it out. She used no products in it before using it and no hairspray to see its potential. It’s amazing. It takes a little bit of getting used to since you have bring the hair up to the wound just the right so that all of the hair fits in it. But once you got the hang of it it’s pretty easy to use. Over all we like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: MGS

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. DISAPPOINTED WIFE!!! And Daughter
customer_reviews.text: NO STARS AT ALL NOT WORTH IT. My wife was really crazy about getting this really expensive Dyson airwrap. One day I surprised her and bought it for her. She was the happiest woman in the world, until she tried it AND REALIZED THAT IT DOESN'T DO WHAT IT CLAIM IT DOES. BIG DISAPPOINTMENT. Her curls kept falling minutes after done, she even bought oils to try again, she tried on my daughter's hair, and curls never stayed. So.. Husbands, if you feel to buy it for your wifes, make sure it can be returned after your wife's disappointment .
customer_reviews.author: ELTON

customer_reviews.title: Its worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Some videos online made it look like the curls were gone after a few minutes but that is not the case. I put a few light weight products in and the curl lasted all day with lots of volume. I have a lot of fly-aways and the round brush smoothed them down. This is the first one i have ever had do that. I have the revlon roundbrush-air dryer and it isnt near as good. Absolute worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cris Stringfellow

customer_reviews.title: Hair at Bottom of Base
customer_reviews.text: Product Box was dented in. Once opened and ready to use for first time, noticed hair strand at base of product. Product was NOT brand new. Seemed used! Absolutely disappointed for such an expensive product!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend for thick, curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this and totally fell for the awesome reviews and zillion videos I watched first. Unfortunately, for my super thick, frizzy, curly hair, it’s just not worth it. I tried all the attachments, several times, to make sure I was getting the hang of it. But I basically had to straighten my hair out, rewet it and then use the curling attachment. Way too many steps. I was better off just using a round brush and good blow dryer. Now hunting for a good hot air brush...
customer_reviews.author: makismom

customer_reviews.title: expensive  great product would have a couple of these if I was hair stylist bc dries hair quickly
customer_reviews.text: LOVE ❤️ IT!!! Have thin dry hair that really holds water and takes forever to dry but this helps dry quick and hair feels great by not having to over style helps by drying it in no time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for shorter hair.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the hairdryer, but my A-line bob was too short to get the rods to wrap the hair. The round brush kept blowing the top hair off leaving a very frizzy top. Super time-consuming. I have straight fine hair. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine James-Lieberstein

customer_reviews.title: Round brush too small to create much volume
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for this because of the price. Overall it's a good product but the round brush is too small to create any sort of volume at the roots. It also tangles your hair easily. I have a short bob cut and need the brush for the back of my hair. If they had just made the brush bigger or included a 2nd brush that is bigger I would have changed my rating to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Heinz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, returns difficult
customer_reviews.text: Hair dryer doesn't heat, just get cold air. Seller makes returns difficult by not providing return labels, you have to do it yourself. Do not buy from Dyson
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery N.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for dry and strong hair
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift to my wife, turns out to be a big disappointment. I'm not expecting it to be as magical as it claims in the commercial, but this thing doesn't work at all for my wife's hair. She tried several times, step by step following the instruction, but it never smooth her hair entirely, and the parts that's effective only stay for 10 minutes. No doubt my wife has thick, dry and strong hair, but if the product is not capable of taming the difficult types of hair, then don't promote it as "engineered for multiple hair types and styles."
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Saves my girlfriend 15 minutes every morning!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a gift for your girlfriend and yourself look no further. First, she uses it every morning and loves it. There are two main benefits of this: IT SAVES TIME. Apparently before this women had to dry their hair and then style it. Now using this it happens at all once, so, using my man math, that's a 50% time savings. Getting ready 50% faster means we get out of the house faster, so win win. MORE OPTIONS. Curling her hair is easy and this makes it happens like some voodoo magic. She just touches the Dyson to her hair and air whirls around and pulls it into an instant curl.
customer_reviews.author: Dariush & Valeriya

customer_reviews.title: Woman changed
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a christmas gift from my husband. I have used many different stylers from L'ange to Chi to Revlon to Conair, and I must say this product has changed my life. I was able to obtain a straight look comparable to using a Chi or L'ange iron by using the Firm smoothing brush and my hair was wet from the shower. Took me minutes instead of hours to style my hair!!
customer_reviews.author: Luz A.

customer_reviews.title: Dirty Product
customer_reviews.text: I would love to write a review on how amazing this product is but I didn’t even get to use it. It was supposed to come shipped to be brand new and when I opened the box there was hair and war looks to be dandruff all over it
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A. Burke

customer_reviews.title: good product when it worked but broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: Ill never by a used product again it broke right away and Dyson support just leaves me on hold. the product was awesome but it broke within a 2 months and i cannot seem to get service. savings are not worth it buy new!!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper12

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I really like Dyson. From this whole package, I really liked the hair dryer feature, but... Revlon does a better job for less $$. I spent less than $100 and got the revlon styler/dryer brush and a round barrel straightener/curler.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you have curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: If you have very curly hair this is NOT the product for you. It doesn’t straighten and when it air dries it’s frizzy. The curls don’t home and it’s a fortune!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time consuming... but the volume and body is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I first used it on hair that wasn’t damp enough. And I thought it was a terrible product. Then I tried and tried again and found that wetting each section just before I used it did the trick. I was shocked at the difference. 10/10 But be prepared to stand there for about 45minutes to an hour just wetting and drying, then cooling every...single... section. The body it gives your hair though!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia H.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Best hairdryer ever! I have fine frizz-prone hair that will mushroom out in humidity. This dryer is the only one I’ve ever used that gives me results like I get at a salon. It is also extremely fast and much quieter than any dryer I have used. Lots of styling options, too. I was so impressed with it that I purchased one for my daughter for Christmas. She said that people have been complimenting her hair since she started using it. The only downside is the ridiculously high price!
customer_reviews.author: cybermab

customer_reviews.title: Gross covered in hair!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is disgusting! The comb and curler are covered in someone else hair!!!!!! It was literally falling out of the box when I opened it! So gross I don’t even know if it worked! I paid too much for this thing to be having to clean someone else hair off it! Being returned!!!! Such a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Smith

customer_reviews.title: The machine is defective.
customer_reviews.text: May 4, 2020 The below message was sent to you and as of now I did not get a response. The Dyson Airwrap shots up and it does not work. I need this machine to be replaced. Thank you. For the last three weeks, this machine shots off as I use it. I have to wait a day or two and even after that it continues to shot off after ten minutes. I need this machine to be replaced. Apparently it is defective. Please advise on how to go about getting a replacement. Thank you, Sara Tucci
customer_reviews.author: Sara Delia Tucci

customer_reviews.title: Failed 9 months in
customer_reviews.text: Unit failed after 9 months of use. Bad wiring where the power cord connected to the handheld unit. Called Dyson and after a 45 minute hold they told me they could not help. As it turns out, the serial number is not on the machine but on the floppy paper tag that is attached to the power cord. All in all a tedious, painful process for a $500 unit.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have thin, fine shoulder length hair. This dryer/styler is worth every penny, in my opinion. In 20 minutes, I have completely dried and styled hair. There is a learning curve in using the Airwrap. It is completely different from anything I have used before. Be sure to watch tutorials to help you get started. The single best thing about this dryer is it doesn’t heat up the whole room. My hair has never looked this full. The curls last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger McGee

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!!
customer_reviews.text: Normally only my hairstylist can make my unruly and frizzy hair smooth. Without her, after three weeks of quarantine, I've been looking like a frizz ball and it is NOT a good look. I decided to take a chance on this product and I'm so glad I did. Wow! Thanks to the round brush attachment, he frizz is gone. Thanks to the curling options, I have smooth waves. I love, love, love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Savelle-Rocklin

customer_reviews.title: Not great for extra long hair.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I really like this but if you have incredibly thick or long hair, this probably isn’t for you. It definitely wasn’t for me. It took ages to dry my hair and the curling attachment couldn’t handle the length of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rizra P.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I watched a couple of videos on how to use this thing before I got it, but I am really impressed. I have very fine (in diameter) hair that's been highlighted and color treated and I could never get this smoothness AND body myself using any blow dry techniques I've ever tried. Usually I'll blow it out then go in with the flat iron curl. And my hair actually came out feeling healthy not with frizzy ends like my normal styling technique does. It's great! I've never met a beauty tool that keeps its promise like this thing. I've never owned a Dyson product before this but I may be a new fan!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth it
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t matter what type of hair you have or what length. I’ve had a good hair day everyday for MONTHS! Gave me something to look forward to during COVID-19. Also it’s super fast and doesn’t damage hair whatsoever. I will never go back to a hairbrush or curler ever again. Also I’m obsessed with the blow dryer and round brush in one! Thanks Dyson so another amazing product. Also it comes with a blow dryer attachment. Only down side is the size. It’s a bit tricky to travel with because it’s super long but totally worth the effort of packing.
customer_reviews.author: SonorWife

customer_reviews.title: For long hair ... reduces drying time by half compared to standard blow drying
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Dyson Airwrap complete as a gift. Advertises reduced drying time over standard blow drying. Feedback I have received is that It works as advertised and cuts drying time by half. Overall a great product with numerous attachments based on hair type and style. Takes a little time getting used to and understanding all of the features. Watching the video helps.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Best For Longer Hair
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for the sausage curl/beach wave look for long hair. With my chin length bob, however, I couldn’t get enough lift or volume. I also had damage/breakage from the high temperature.
customer_reviews.author: wingtrue

customer_reviews.title: Endless hair styles
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of the Dyson Airwrap. It’s a big hit around our house and I never am able to find mine. So Birthday idea! Nonetheless, works like a charm, as everything there is always a learning curve. But once you work with it the hair styles are endless and super easy. The worst part of the airwrap is the price, but I think in the long run it pays for itselfs, just always having that salon blowout alone look is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: geniphre

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have very corse hard to curl hair. If I don't straighten it then it is frizzy. After getting this as a gift I decided to try it out. I was amazed at how soft and bouncy my curls felt! It was still curly the next morning! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton’s

customer_reviews.title: Love this product but don’t like the price
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive but it works so well. I mostly use the barrels for curls. It took me a while to figure out how to use it but once I did it gave me beautiful curls that lasted 3-4 days! The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because of the price. It may be worth the price if you have a hard time getting nice curls with a curling iron. My hair is fine and thin and does not hold curls well but I can go days with my hair looking good using this product. I still haven’t decided if nice hair is worth the price if this product.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Love this dryer styler
customer_reviews.text: I have the original Dyson Turbo Hairdryer. I love it!!! When I first received the Airwrap Styler/Dryer, I wasn't sure I liked it. I seriously thought about sending it back. But.... This styler dryer is awesome! It's outstanding! It definitely takes a little use to learn how to use it. Just remember this: Let it do its job!!! Don't try to make it difficult to use it... it will do ALL the work! If I want smooth hair with good body, I use one of the brushes. If I want just waves with body, I use the large barrel. If I want more curl & body, I use the small barrel. I love this!!!
customer_reviews.author: SwissMiss

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever!
customer_reviews.text: This whole set is a bombshell. I’m a license cosmetologist and with a busy schedule I barely have time for my hair. I have bleach platinum frizzy curly hair and the smoothing brush dries and straighten my hair in 15 mins max. In the morning, I retouch my roots if needed with my regular straightener or I just create waves with the barrels. I would truly recommend Dyson Airwrap to anyone that has damage hair and/or wants to reduce time in styling their hair. Practice, practice, and practice to create the hairstyles of your dream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! Dries my long hair in 1/2 the time. The curling attachments make it SO EASY to create a salon look. It was always difficult for me to achieve voluminous hair at home - now I can! 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Czaplewski

customer_reviews.title: Need a lot of practice to use it effectively.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the advertised features but it didn't perform as demonstrated in commercials.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Hair styling only lasted a couple of hours
customer_reviews.text: I heard great reviews about this one, but For my type of hair, this was not a great deal. I tried the antifrizz brush and my hair didn’t look tamed 100%. The hair style I did with the brushes lasted less than 2hours and then the hair started gaining freeze and becoming bulky again.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela montiel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these since the day they came out. Finally received as a gift and I can honestly say it was worth the wait! Does everything it says and more!! Dried my hair in half the time and curling hair has never been easier!!!
customer_reviews.author: paul dennis

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This product is a game changer! I pretty much have every hair tool made and they all sit in my vanity drawers because I’m too uncoordinated and impatient to use them properly... this was pretty easy for me to figure out within the first few minutes and I was able to style my hair very nicely straight out of the box! This never happens for me so I’m thrilled to say the least. I debated on buying it since it was released just on price alone- but let me tell you, it’s worth the money! I won’t need another styling tool ever again! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: curling iron with minimal work
customer_reviews.text: This is the best curling iron I have seen. Only problem I had was my hair, not the Dyson Airwrap. My hair is so fine that it will not hold a curl. Saying that, it works better and curls faster and easier than other curling irons without burning the hair or scalp. Definitely would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heyford

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive!! But I love it. It was hard to get used to letting it wrap my hair but once you get the hang of it, it’s a blast. I wish the Wands were a little longer instead of having to purchase them extra.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Grizzaffi

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I love this. I have shoulder length naturally curly hair. Of course, I like to wear it straight. Unfortunately, that occurs once every 4 weeks, when I go to the hairdresser. If I blow it dry/straighten it, it takes 45 minutes. This morning I used the dyson airwrap. My hair went from wet to dry and styled in 8 minutes! It’s easy to use and a miracle!
customer_reviews.author: Juli England

customer_reviews.title: Used!
customer_reviews.text: Before I even took the product out of the box, it was clear that it had been used. Paying full price for a used product is unacceptable and disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: TXLex

customer_reviews.title: If you can afford it, get it!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence on buying this product because I saw amazing reviews, then some less than savory reviews and I just wanted to love this product and made the jump to get it despite the negative reviews, and omg this is the most revolutionary product I’ve ever purchased. People say it takes a learning curve but I’m not the best with hair products and I was able to figure it out right when I got it! This product is a must if you can afford it! I legit just replaced my hair dryer and curling iron with this amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but I wish it was dual voltage for traveling and I wish the round brush was stronger so it would give more definition. The curls look beautiful they just don’t last long. But it does feel like less harmful to the hair altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Fit mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: this product is amazing..I was skeptical at first,was wrong and just love it..I had damaged hair and now with using this product with flat brush attachment I eliminate flat ironing my hair. Also gives my hair more volume and looks healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M Moore

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on thick hair
customer_reviews.text: If you have thick hair this product will not work. Not enough power to dry my hair and it will only curl a very small section of my hair. It took longer than a regular curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: christy renee freud

customer_reviews.title: The gift that keeps on giving
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves this thing, and the really unexpected bonus is that I am getting a few hours a WEEK of my life back because she's able to do her hair that much faster (and better). Win-win. It's expensive but it's absolutely worth it for BOTH parties!
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!! So worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My hair dresser used the curling tools in my just highlighted and blow dried hair last week. It looked so easy the way the air automatically curled your hair around the wand. I had to try it for myself. I am not one who can do my hair at all at home with the round brush or even close to how they do it at the salon. Let me tell you -this product is amazing. I cannot believe the ease of use. It makes my hair look so healthy with body - like I just walked out of the salon. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Oropesa

customer_reviews.title: Dyson Rip Off big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my product when I purchased it online through Amazon. Just to be disappointed that Dyson made the air wrap compatible only with 120V. I love in a country that uses 220 V. And I travel a lot. Is Dyson expecting each customer to but two models compatible with every country they travel to? Rip Off. It will even coast next more to return it from where I live!
customer_reviews.author: MISS M R A HALAWANI

customer_reviews.title: Not for short hair
customer_reviews.text: I love the dyson products but this is not for short hair and all of the models have long hair and I should have known that before I purchased the curler. I unfortunately had to return the item. Well made and I am sure it will do what it is supposed to do when you have medium or long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: The wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift to my wife. She loves it. I would love to give pros and cons regarding the features of this product but I know absolutely nothing about it. What I do know is that she has not said one negative thing about this product. If she’s happy with it then I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: duane_train

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: As a person who dries their hair basically every day, Dyson technology will surely help to keep my hair healthy. It gives awesome results in a shorter time than the regular dryers. Yes, it is expensive but it comes with features that you cannot compare with others. If you care about the health of your hair, invest your money on this set.
customer_reviews.author: Talita Glass

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PERFORMANCE
customer_reviews.text: ITS AMAZING! BEAUTIFULLY PACKED! EASIER ORDERING FROM AMAZON THEN IT IS FROM COMPANY DYSON! MAKES NICE WAVES AND CURLS! MY DRYING/STYLE TIME CUT IN HALF! MY HAIR LOOKS FULLER, AND SHINY!!! MORE PRACTICE AND I WILL LOOK LIKE I WENT TO BEAUTY PARLOR
customer_reviews.author: JENNEY

customer_reviews.title: Wife swears by it
customer_reviews.text: It dries her hair faster and without pulling a hair out (unlike when using a round brush). She is VERY HAPPY, so that says it all.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: This isn’t a new product.
customer_reviews.text: Was received used. Hair in the brush. Hair in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Barnett

customer_reviews.title: It's great even for shorter hair!
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive but worth the money. It's done wonders for my hair style. Its all I need to dry and style my hair. The only drawback is that it's a bit awkward using the air wrap when you go from one side of the head to the other. I'm boxing up all my other hair implements. All they do now is take up room.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle D Young

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase! It works so great on my hair, I no longer need those expensive, eye burning, smelly, Keratin treatments. Watch some you tube videos to help you in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: LAG

customer_reviews.title: Shocking results!
customer_reviews.text: This is worth every penny!!!! Today I tried my Dyson for the first time and the results on my hair were shocking. I have quite thick hair, a lot, a little curl and it absorbs a lot of water and in half an hour I was ready! I used the brush with thick bristles and the round one at the end to shape the ends. As my Dyson arrived, I looked at some tutorials on YouTube and they were quite functional. For having been the first time, I am in love, hopefully it will continue like this. My advice is using anti-frizz products for drying.
customer_reviews.author: LGS

customer_reviews.title: Dyson strikes again.
customer_reviews.text: Omg...made my wife soooooo happy. This dryer/style is the best. Very easy to use and does the hair while styling it. Also it does not pull or damage the hair. Much recommended for ladies with thin hair - it will not damage it and still you can style it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Horica_bau

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with my Airwrap. I’ve had it almost 3 months, so issues. A little bit of a learning curve on use but now I feel like a pro. It seriously makes my hair feel silkier and there’s no friz - even the next day my hair felt better. My 9 Year old is now drying her own hair with the brush attachment. Makes drying her super long hair so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: mamabell

customer_reviews.title: Just a expensive hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hair dryer but way to expensive.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: I used to hate doing my hair. Now I look forward to it.
customer_reviews.text: I have thick fine wavy hair the is just above my waist. I LOVE THIS!!! Best splurge ever. My curls have never lasted this long ever. My straight hair is so smooth. And I love how I can dry and style at the same time. Trust me you need this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sumpter

customer_reviews.title: Used Product
customer_reviews.text: I received a used item as well with hair in it. How does this happen more than once. I saw a similar review on here and thought it was a one time mistake. How disgusting and insulting with a $550 price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't burn my neck.
customer_reviews.text: It makes me happy. Makes natural curly hair easily. I usually curl my hair after shower with almost dryed hair. Results stay all day with little styling product. Brushes kind of heavy though. Not able to make mermaid curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Can’t love this enough!  45 minutes to 15?  Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: I have rheumatoid disease in neck, back & shoulders. My hair drying & styling with 4 different devices is now 15 minutes & my Dyson! It is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for curl but good for smooth
customer_reviews.text: My hair is really thick and unless I do about 15 strands at a time my hair will not adhere to the wand. And when it does, 5 strands of the 15 won’t adhere to the wand and come out straight, so when I take the wand away I have this nice curl with partial straight pieces intertwined. Tried manually winding but no luck. But if you are trying to smooth your hair (I have natural curl that can get like Bozo hair) this is the absolute best. Would have returned it for the curling part but the smoothing part of it makes it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Castle Bascom

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift that was a real winner
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it's pricey but from what my Niece says, it's incredible.
customer_reviews.author: D. Welter

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but works very well
customer_reviews.text: I really like how the curling attachment works. It saves a significant amount of time since it drying and curls within the same step. With my hair, the drying/curling combo process requires more product in order to ensure a "hold".
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Shay

customer_reviews.title: Dyson’s first fail
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Curls didn’t last, and the other features were worse. I love my Dyson dryer, but they reached on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is so amazing I love how my hair feel after I've used it, you have lots of volume and it takes very lil time to dry my hair. My hair is very thick and takes for ever with a normal hair dryer! The curles are awesome and last without hairspray! The only negative thing I could say about the product is the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C.

customer_reviews.title: Best product I have invested in!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love love this product. Took me a wild to get used to using the curling attachments. But very easy to catch on. Watch some YouTube videos for guidance!!
customer_reviews.author: Lara Niemann

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for a woman who loves her hair, and for me i love what it does for her. With all th options she now takes care of her look much more, she puts her time and effort, and to me she enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it!!!! And I love it because the time my wife saves on doing her hair allows us to leave on time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arivero

customer_reviews.title: All in one
customer_reviews.text: An all in one hair gadget, that reduces time in half for drying and styling.
customer_reviews.author: Bogotá

customer_reviews.title: Amazing curls amazing hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say O M G wow wow wow this is the best thing that ever happened to my hair. I got amazing waves with zero effort - thank you Dyson
customer_reviews.author: Wubzy

customer_reviews.title: Learning curve
customer_reviews.text: This is expensive but does sooo many different hair styles. The curl attachment is very good! It has a small learning curve on the curls but a really good product. Thankfully I had several gift cards to help with the price!
customer_reviews.author: sheri penn

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved it. The $50 gift card was also a nice touch to "lower" the overall net price to a more competitive cost. Especially if you use Amazon frequently. Dyson customer service is also excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Super expensive, but it does work well
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Works great. Mostly easy to use but does take practice. I still feel it's waaaaay too much for the product, but she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: sammdad24

customer_reviews.title: Not for professional use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not quite what I was thinking for a professional product. Want to return but the return window is closed now 🙄
customer_reviews.author: karli king

customer_reviews.title: Wife didn't seem to think it was great
customer_reviews.text: wife said she liked it "ok" but rather just use the curler and accessories she already has.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: It was very hard to stomach this price tag but I have been blown away by the Dyson Airwrap. I STINK at blow drying my hair. Not only is this very easy to use, it dries so quickly and my hair feels so soft and healthy. Amazing product... just wish it weren't so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Vil N

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey, but VERY worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. She couldn't believe the change from old irons and dryers. Like a salon styling each time. And doesn't over-dry or damage the hair. Very cool device.
customer_reviews.author: Hawker404

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money and best product ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing I am so glad I bought it . Will never need another hair dryer curling iron or straightener this is all you need
customer_reviews.author: Ines Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loved It
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a splurge, but the wife loved it and says it has cut down on the time it takes for her to dry/style her hair. She was happy -- and that made me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this from Amazon, too short of return option
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t straighten hair well at all. I missed the thirty day return so now I’m stuck with a $600 useless equipment. I’ve learned never to order appliances from amazon because of the short return period.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Chavin

customer_reviews.title: Bad value
customer_reviews.text: Price to value is ridiculous, this thing is all plastic and should cost about $75
customer_reviews.author: Chase Honnecke

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I look like I get a professional blow out everyday. My hair is so much healthier! No more fly aways or frizzy look . This has been a god send!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bertelsen

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks. Over priced, does the exact same thing a 20 dollar curling iron does. Don’t buy it, save your money.
customer_reviews.author: David Silk

customer_reviews.title: Paid over $400 to have this product for my wedding, to receive it and nothing works on it!
customer_reviews.text: When I got my Dyson Airwrap after paying over $400 and waited for this product to have for my wedding, absolutely nothing would work on it! Pretty upsetting During one of the most important days of my life!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Ghan

customer_reviews.title: Sooo easy
customer_reviews.text: It's worth the money! You don't need a hairstylist anymore.. It's easy to use and also great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

product_meta.title: Dyson Complete Styler for Multiple Hair Types and Styles, Fuchsia
product_meta.description: Style Name:Dyson Airwrap Complete, Fuchsia| Colour:FuchsiaDyson Airwrap™ Complete styler for multiple hair types and styles What it is Dyson Airwrap™ Complete styler is engineered for multiple hair types and styles. Featuring Coanda air styling and propelled by the Dyson digital motor, users can curl, wave, smooth and dry with no extreme heat. The most awarded hair styling tool in 2019*, including the Allure Best of Beauty Breakthrough award. What it does Attracts and wraps hair, using only air The Coanda effect attracts hair to the barrel, then wraps it for you, using only air. Styles and dries simultaneously Engineered to style damp hair. Combines powerful airflow with controlled heat, to dry your hair as it styles. 2 inch Airwrap™ barrels Engineered to create voluminous curls or waves. 6 inch Airwrap™ barrels Engineered to create loose curls or waves. Firm smoothing brush Engineered to smooth and control frizz-prone hair. Soft smoothing brush Engineered to gently align and smooth fine hair. Round volumizing brush- Engineered to volumize and shape fine, flat hair. Pre-styling dryer Takes hair from wet to damp, to prep for styling. Features and Benefits Coanda to curl The Dyson Airwrap™ styler harnesses the Coanda effect to wrap hair against the barrel. No clamping mechanisms or gloves, just voluminous curls and waves. Coanda to smooth The smoothing brushes mimic a stylists blow-dry by attracting hair to their surface and propelling air along the stands. No extreme heat damage Intelligent heat control measures air temperature over 40 times a second to prevent extreme heat damage while styling. One-click attachments + cool-touch tips A quick-release switch and cool-touch tip allow you to quickly change attachments while styling. Symmetry barrels Clockwise and anti-clockwise barrels for symmetrical curls. Negative ions Help reduce static in the hair. Cool shot To set your style. Easy clean filter Magnetic, removable and washable, with filter cleaning brush. Swivel cable for ease of movement, at any angle. Storage case Protects and neatly stores your Dyson Airwrap™ styler and its attachments. 2-year On parts and labor.
feature_bullets: Dyson Airwrap Complete Styler is engineered for multiple hair types and styles. Featuring Coanda air styling and propelled by the Dyson digital motor, users can curl, wave, smooth and dry with no extreme heat.
Styles and dries simultaneously - engineered to style damp hair by combining powerful airflow with controlled heat, to dry your hair as it styles
Harnesses the Coanda effect to wrap hair around the barrel for voluminous curls and waves using only air, no clamping mechanisms or gloves
Smoothing brushes mimic a stylists’ blow-dry by attracting hair to their surface and propelling air along the stands

Set includes: Two 1. 2“ Airwrap barrels engineered to create voluminous curls or waves, two 1. 6” Airwrap barrels engineered to create loose curls or waves, firm smoothing brush engineered to smooth and control frizz-prone hair, firm smoothing brush engineered to smooth and control frizz-prone hair, soft smoothing brush engineered to gently align and smooth fine hair, round volumizing brush engineered to volumize and shape fine, flat hair, Pre-styling dryer takes hair from wet to damp, to prep for styling
One-click attachments and a quick-release switch allows you to quickly change attachments while styling
Swivel cable for ease of movement, at any angle

1300 watts of power, Cord measures 8' 9” long, Styler will never go over 302 degrees F. Dial selector, Storage case, Negative ions help reduce static in the hair, Cool shot sets your style, Swivel cable for ease of movement, at any angle, Intelligent heat control
2-year limited manufacturer's on parts and labor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars676 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
